_walk(root='.', recurse=True, pattern='*')¶

Private Function:

Arguments: root - the top folder path to walk through recurse - if True will go through sub-folders pattern - file extension to look for (i.e. *.c)

Description: Generator for walking a directory tree. Starts at specified root folder, returning files that match our pattern. Optionally will also recurse through sub-folders.
